In life as long as there is darkness there will be light. Guys don't struggle, enjoy all sides of the coin even when it's netorare.

In this world where no one is a protagonist neither a side character, in the great scheme taking sides is meaningless. My goal is to become an observer of my own life, letting it light a beautiful spark or a dimmed flame until the day I die; whatever there comes, I must accept with a smile after all it's the journey that matters. That's the way I think which makes me understand and enjoy netorare. Once you understand you won't feel any negative feelings towards it. Once you enjoy, you will be drawn to it. Enjoying or not is your own choice and one that isn't wrong or right, but understanding it is a step everyone must take with everything that "bother" them.

Funny thing about that? Elephants avoid things the size of ping pong balls for fear of injuring their pretty sensitive feet. It’s used as a deterrent by African farmers, just shoot a few their way and they take a detour (they throw chili powder in there for a double whammy if they try to move them with their trunk).
